summary: Piccolo\'s Special Beam Cannon From Dragon Ball Z
descriptionHtml:
**** Installation********
Place in the Folder C:/Program Files (86)/Steam/SteamApps/common/Skyrim/Data\\

***********Description*******************
A spell I Created to make a stream of light similar to Piccolo\'s SPC attack from Dragon Ball Z. With a bonus Fire Damage added to the spell its an apprentice level spell with 6 Magicka A Second. The Spell is Located inside a dresser in Fendals House at Riverwood. Not Much Else To It Just Comment How Much You Like The Spell. Thanks Guys.
author: Konyo95
